subject: Dear Beneficiarys,
body:
Dear Beneficiarys, 
       CONGRATULATIONS To you today, you were chosen as one of the enlisted Benefactor for this Grant , whom I contacted via private message. You get a Giveaway from us & additional Grant from our very attractive sponsors.
    How to get the Grant, register yourself via our link below.
Here  https:/ /specprofit.com/assot/BB-register.php
(No Fee)
Follow the steps and if you have (DONE) that please send me your proof of registration or screenshot,
Congratulations and Thank You .
Regard
If you have any questions or difficulties with registration, please contact us.
Best Regards,
Mr Lampard

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiarys,
body:
Hello Mr. Lampard,

Thank you for your message and the opportunity to register for the Grant. I'm really excited about this! Could you please provide me with more details about the process? What kind of proof do I need to send after registration?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marie
